code: import{http}from"./http";export async function listCameras(){const{data}=await http.get("/cameras");return data;}export async function createCamera(payload){const{data}=await http.post("/cameras",payload);return data;}export async function updateCamera(cameraId,payload){const{data}=await http.patch("/cameras/".concat(cameraId),payload);return data;}export async function deleteCamera(cameraId){const{data}=await http.delete("/cameras/".concat(cameraId));return data;}export async function startCamera(cameraId){const{data}=await http.post("/cameras/".concat(cameraId,"/start"));return data;}export async function stopCamera(cameraId){const{data}=await http.post("/cameras/".concat(cameraId,"/stop"));return data;}
